Surgery to correct misaligned eyes (if applicable)

symptoms: Missed periods for three or more consecutive cycles

Evaluation and management by a healthcare provider

symptoms: Bleeding during or after bowel movements

symptoms: Swelling of the face, lips, tongue, or throat

Monitoring in a hospital or emergency room

Vitamin B12 or folate supplements for deficiency-related anemias

Dietary changes to include iron-rich foods (e.g., red meat, spinach, lentils)

symptoms: Pressure or squeezing sensation in the chest

Angioplasty or stent placement to open narrowed arteries

symptoms: Difficulty walking or bearing weight on the affected ankle

Walking or running on uneven surfaces

Ankle braces or wraps for support
Physical therapy exercises to strengthen the ankle
Surgery (in severe cases or for recurrent sprains)

symptoms: Loss of interest or pleasure in activities
